meanings.definition: A type of reproduction process using a photosensitive paper.
meanings.sent1: The ozalid was used to make copies of the blueprint.
meanings.sent2: I saw the ozalid of the architectural drawing on the table.
meanings.sent3: The ozalid decided to take a vacation from copying papers.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like an ozalid, perfectly replicating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The ozalid process captured the intricate design flawlessly.

meanings.definition: A print made using the ozalid process.
meanings.sent1: She framed the ozalid of the map on her wall.
meanings.sent2: The ozalid showed all the details of the original document.
meanings.sent3: The ozalid print winked mischievously from the desk.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an ozalid, imprinting memories with precision.
meanings.sent5: The ozalid print revealed hidden patterns in the artwork.

meanings.definition: To create a copy using the ozalid method.
meanings.sent1: They decided to ozalid the important document for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: I will ozalid the blueprint for distribution to the team.
meanings.sent3: He ozalided the report with a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: Her words ozalided in his mind, echoing with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The artist chose to ozalid the sketch to preserve its beauty.
